meanings.definition: Remove nitrogen or nitrogen compounds from.
meanings.sent1: The bacteria are denitrifying the soil, helping to keep it healthy.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use denitrifying techniques to reduce the amount of nitrogen in the water.
meanings.sent3: The denitrifying process is like a natural filter for the environment.
meanings.sent4: The denitrifying action of the plants cleanses the air of harmful substances.
meanings.sent5: I watched the denitrifying bacteria work their magic in the compost pile.

meanings.sent1: The soil is denitrifying as part of the natural nitrogen cycle.
meanings.sent2: The water in the wetland is denitrifying slowly over time.
meanings.sent3: The garden soil seemed to be denitrifying itself without any help.
meanings.sent4: The old pipes were denitrifying, causing a decrease in nitrogen levels.
meanings.sent5: I could see the denitrifying process happening right before my eyes.
